EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont Customer Privacy request - Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
We have received your request for changes to the personal information that DuPont has concerning you.
Be advised that we will begin processing your request shortly. For further queries and assistance, please contact us using the details provided below.
Sincerely,
DuPont Inquiry Management Center
Toll-free number : 00800 3876 68 38
Phone : 0034 985 12 37
Fax : 0034 912 72 52 37
E-mail: eu-info@dupont.com
